discourse_list.title: Our condolences go to Phil and his family

content.content: @Philinje was an esteemed colleague and the first grantee to join our RWF family. He has helped immensely with experience and always had a good humour to go with. He has pioneered work with New Silver (NS) and contributed widely to the crypto ecosystem. But most importantly, he left in this world a lovely wife and two young children. We want to send our deepest condolences to his family and loved ones. As a community, I’d like us to consider in which capacity we can assist or support the family navigate this difficult and tragic time. If MKR tokenholders, governance or @Recognized-Delegates have any plans on supporting contributors, we would like to listen to them. All our condolences to the family. On behalf of the RWF team. Will

Thank you for creating this heartfelt condolences @williamr — the Delegates are open to the suggested idea by @PaperImperium or any suggestions you or other in the community want to suggest. Looking forward to hearing from others.
Would love to be able to send flowers, make a donation or whatever else we can to help his family or an organization they wish to designate.
It would be great if we could collaborate and donate something for his family, a fundamental pillar of a community is unity.
This topic was automatically closed 90 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
